author: Staff Reporter
text:
A six-day special reconnection and distribution of free mobile SIM cards mela would begin in Karungal on Tuesday, said a release issued by K. Sajju George, General Manager, Nagercoil Telecom Circle, here on Sunday.

The release said that the special camps would be arranged to encourage long-time customers of BSNL to avail themselves of reconnection facilities with a host of offers in the towns around Marthandam. The date, venue of the camps: opposite Karungal bus stop January 19, Kannanagam BSNL Exchange January 21, Standard Auditorium in Marthandam on January 23, Kuzhithurai BSNL exchange January 17 and BSNL Customer Service Centre in Kulasekaram on January 29.

Customers could also avail free portability from other telecom operators and free 3G SIM cards. The camps would be held from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. the release added.
title: BSNL special reconnection mela
